  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      This is the main method where the other methods are going to be executed.
      Parameters:
      args - : the string arguments

    • menu

      public void menu()
      this method shows the user the valid options to execute.

    • executeOption

      public void executeOption(int ans)
      This method executes the option previously selected by the user from the menu or
      Parameters:
      ans - : int the option selected by the user.

    • registerProject

      public void registerProject()
      This method asks the user to type some of the atributes of the project that is going to be register, such as: the project's name, the client's name, the start and final date, the budget and the phases. Also, it asks the user for the managers name and cellphone. All this information is send to the class controller in order to register the project.

    • addPhases

      public void addPhases(int projectsPosition)
      This method asks the user for the duration in months of each project's phase and send them to the controller.
      Parameters:
      projectsPosition - : int the position in the array of projects in which the phases are going to be add.

    • culminatePhase

      public void culminatePhase()
      This method aks the user to enter the name of the project that they want to complete the active phase for. and checks whether a project with that name exists or if it has an active phase. Then it sends this information to the controller class.

    • isRegistrableCapsule

      public void isRegistrableCapsule()
      This method checks if its posible to register a capsule and if it is, calls the method that does that.

    • registerCapsule

      public void registerCapsule(int pos)
      This method asks the user to type some of the atributes of the capsule that is going to be register, such as the id, the description, the type, the name and the position of the collaborator that registers the capsule and the learned lesson. All this information is sent to the controller so it can register the capsule.
      Parameters:
      pos - : int the position in the array of projects in which the capsule is going to be add.

    • capsuleTypesMenu

      public void capsuleTypesMenu()
      this method shows the valid types of capsule

    • validateHashtags

      public boolean validateHashtags(String input)
      This method checks if a String input has at least two hashtags.
      Parameters:
      input - : String text input.
      Returns:
      false if it doesn't finds at least two hashtags or true if it does.

    • approveCapsule

      public void approveCapsule()
      This method asks the user where is the capsule they are going to approve and, if the system finds it, it calls the method that can approve it.

    • publishCapsule

      public void publishCapsule()
      This method asks the user where is the capsule they are going to publish and, if the system finds it, it calls the method that can publish it.

    • readDate

      public Calendar readDate(String msg)
      This method reads and validate a date typed by the user.
      Parameters:
      msg - : String the message that will be displayed to the user to indicate what or where to write their response.
      Returns:
      : Calendar the input of the user.

    • validateInteger

      public int validateInteger(String message)
      This method validates an integer input by the user.
      Parameters:
      message - : String the message that will be displayed to the user to indicate what or where to write their response.
      Returns:
      : int the input of the user.

    • validateDouble

      public double validateDouble(String message)
      This method validates a double input by the user.
      Parameters:
      message - : String the message that will be displayed to the user to indicate what or where to write their response.
      Returns:
      : double the input of the user.
